name: Data Runner
description:
Phantom Series - No.7:

The Phantom series is a collection of pieces leading up to a short film I'm making, working title "Phantom".

The film is a stylized audio-visual journey through the evolution of a computer program achieving sentience, told in 5 acts.

This piece explores the visuals for the 1st act - "Dot World"

video | 1080 x 1080 | 30fps

Art and music: Daniel Sierra | @dbsierra4444
